title: Kristin Scott Thomas
summary: Dame Kristin Ann Scott Thomas[1] DBE (born 24 May 1960) is an English actress who also holds French citizenship.[2] A five-time BAFTA Award and Olivier Award nominee, she won the BAFTA Award for Best Actress in a Supporting Role for Four Weddings and a Funeral (1994) and the Olivier Award for Best Actress in 2008 for the Royal Court revival of The Seagull. She was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Actress for The English Patient (1996).
